name: Encryption
taskDescription: This cryptographic task generates code encrypts data. Depending on the exact use-case, it either combines secret and public-key encryption or makes use of password-based encryption.

name: SecurePassword
taskDescription: Prepare a password for authentication or database storage.

name: SecureCommunication
taskDescription: Establish a secure communication channel (e.g., TLS/SSL connection).

name: Experimental
taskDescription: This category comprises experimental algorithms and use cases that where developed with the CROSSING research project.

name: DigitalSignatures
taskDescription: This cryptographic task generates code that allows for the signing of data. A new key pair is generated for the signature and you may also get code for verification generated.
